properties.name: Australia
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackAustralAvailable in Australia and New Zealand, the meal includes 10 pasta pieces (filled with cheese and vegetables) with Zoo Goo (Italian pasta sauce), pair of small plastic tongs, a toy, and a milk drink with a ‘Sipaah’ flavored straw (chocolate or strawberry). It is aimed to be a healthier alternative to the current Cheeseburger or McNuggets Happy Meal. This was added to the menu on January 17, 2007.

properties.name: McDonald's - India
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackNew Delhi, India"In India, there are no Big Macs because the Hindu people don\'t eat beef. However, they have the Maharaja Mac, which is a Big Mac made of lamb or chicken meat. There is also a vegetarian burger, the McAloo Tikki."

properties.name: McDonald's - Norway
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackOslo, Norway"In fish-loving Norway, they have the McLaks, a sandwich made of grilled salmon and dill sauce."

properties.name: McDonald's Australia - Pasta Zoo Happy Meal
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackCanberra, AustraliaAvailable in Australia and New Zealand, the meal includes 10 pasta pieces (filled with cheese and vegetables) with Zoo Goo (Italian pasta sauce), pair of small plastic tongs, a toy, and a milk drink with a ‘Sipaah’ flavored straw (chocolate or strawberry). It is aimed to be a healthier alternative to the current Cheeseburger or McNuggets Happy Meal. This was added to the menu on January 17, 2007.

properties.name: McDonald's Brazil - McCalabresa
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackBrasilia, Brazil“McCalabresa” sandwich has been recently launched. It is made up of a sausage patty and seasoned with vinaigrette sauce. Inspired in a popular street food (sanduíche de calabresa).

properties.name: McDonald's Canada - McHomard
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackIn some locations in the Maritime Provinces of Canada McDonald’s offers a lobster roll called a McLobster (McHomard in French).

properties.name: McDonald's Greece - Greek Mac
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackAthens, GreeceA favorite local sandwich in Greece is the Greek Mac, consisting of two burger patties wrapped in a pita with yogurt sauce, tomato slices, iceberg lettuce and onions. The sandwich is also offered in Belgium, Croatia, the Czech Republic, Spain, Cyprus, and Portugal.

properties.name: McDonald's India - Maharaja Mac
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackNew Delhi, India * Beef and pork products are not served to cater to Indian religious sensitivities. Chicken (that too, only non-Halal) along with fish are the only meat products used. * The Big Mac is replaced by the Maharaja Mac, which was originally a mutton burger, but is now a chicken burger. * In India, vegetarian and meat dishes are prepared in separate areas of the restaurant in respect for vegetarians, and cooks preparing vegetarian dishes wear distinctive green aprons.

properties.name: McDonald's Philippines - McSpaghetti
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackMcDonald’s sells spaghetti (to compete with local fast food franchise Jollibee), which is called, unsurprisingly, McSpaghetti. In 1993, a popular combo featured spaghetti with fried chicken wings. Also unique to the Filipino menu is the Burger McDo, a ground pork burger served with a Thousand Island dressing like sauce to cater to local tastes. Also sells “Rice burgers” chicken fillet or beef burger served in rice toasted to shaped like buns.

properties.name: McDonald's USA - Arch Deluxe
properties.description: Posted by Shadowmanjack430 West 24th Street Rm 1A, New York, NY, 10011The Arch Deluxe was a hamburger created and marketed by McDonald\'s with the intent of capturing the adult fast food consumer market, presented as a more sophisticated burger for an adult palate. It failed to catch on and is seen as one of the most expensive flops of all time. The Arch Deluxe was a quarter pound of beef, on a toasted split-top sesame seed bun topped with a circular piece of peppered bacon, leaf lettuce and tomato, and a "secret" mustard sauce. It was seen by some consumer groups as a huge step back after more nutritional offerings such as the "McLean" reduced-fat burger (which also failed).

properties.name: McDonalds Japan- Tamago Double Mac
properties.description: Posted by ShadowmanjackTamago Double Mac: Hamburger with 2 beef patties, pepper sauce, bacon, and a poached egg. Served with or without cheese.
